Hi,

I imagine the reason that you cannot test is because local interfaces 
are not accessible from outside.  Please check out Cactus (J2EEUnit). 
 It addresses just the issue, along with many others.

http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/

Shane

csurbesh wrote:

> Hi,
>     I am working on ejb and i had wrote test cases for facades. Now 
>i am having difficult in writing test cases for local interfaces
>(bean,local,localhome).If any body has worked on this please mail.
>
> regards
